sentences.en: A large number of inborn errors of metabolism are known in man.
sentences.cn: 人们了解到在人类中存在大量的先天性代谢缺陷.

sentences.en: After years of dieting, Carol's metabolism was completely out of whack.
sentences.cn: 经过数年的节食, 卡罗尔的新陈代谢完全紊乱了.

sentences.en: All living matter undergoes a process of metabolism.
Antibiotics can cause disorders of water and salt metabolism.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素能引起水、盐代谢的紊乱.

sentences.en: Basal metabolism is much lower for creatures in cold water.
sentences.cn: 冷水中生物的基础代谢速度要低很多。

sentences.en: Certain other elements are needed in trace amounts for cell metabolism.
sentences.cn: 细胞的新陈代谢还需某些其它的微量元素.

sentences.en: Metabolism is a complexity of chemical reaction.
sentences.cn: 代谢是各种化学反应的综合.

sentences.en: Persons with diabetes suffer from improper metabolism of sugar.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病人的糖代谢受到阻碍.

sentences.en: Quantitative information on these aspects of protein metabolism is scarce.
sentences.cn: 有关这方面的蛋白质代谢的定量知识是贫乏的.

sentences.en: The body's metabolism is slowed down by extreme cold.
sentences.cn: 严寒可以使身体新陈代谢的速度下降。

sentences.en: The liver is the centre of metabolism in the body.
sentences.cn: 肝脏是全身代谢的中心.

sentences.en: The water - soluble vitamins, embracing the B complex and vitamin C, are important for animal metabolism.
sentences.cn: 包括维生素B族和维生素C在内的 水溶性 维生素对动物代谢是重要的.

sentences.en: Their drug , Famoxin , speeds up the metabolism to make patients burn off the fat.
sentences.cn: 他们的药物Famoxin,能加速新陈代谢,使病人的脂肪燃烧.

sentences.en: Their rate of metabolism may slow down.
sentences.cn: 他们的新陈代谢率可能会降低.

sentences.en: This drug speeds up your metabolism.
sentences.cn: 这种药物会加快你的新陈代谢。

sentences.en: This rapid turnover of material in living things is part of their metabolism.
sentences.cn: 这些生物体内物质的迅速循环,是它们新陈代谢的一部分.

phrases.tran_cn: 需氧代谢；有氧新陈代谢
类脂物代谢作用；类脂化合物代谢作用

trans.tran_en: the chemical processes by which food is changed into energy in your body
